654.source:
function readMe() {
    Global.alertOK("Make or edit A Basic SVG Path.  " + 
    " Edit brings up a path editor, which is a simple tile-based overlay on the SVG Path Commands.  " +
            "Make Arrow makes an arrow; Make Regular Polygon " +
           " makes a regular n-sided polygon.  Make Regular Star makes an n-pointed " +
           "star.  The latter three menu options show a panel to " +
           " specify the parameters.  ")
   
}

3075.source:
function readMe() {
    Global.alertOK("Make or edit A Basic SVG Path.  " + 
    " Edit brings up a path editor, which is a simple tile-based overlay on the SVG Path Commands.  " +
            "Make Arrow makes an arrow; Make Regular Polygon " +
           " makes a regular n-sided polygon.  Make Regular Star makes an n-pointed " +
           "star.  The latter three menu options show a panel to " +
           " specify the parameters.  ")
   
}

5337.source:
function readMe() {
    Global.alertOK("Make or edit A Basic SVG Path.  " + 
    " Edit brings up a path editor, which is a simple tile-based overlay on the SVG Path Commands.  " +
            "Make Arrow makes an arrow; Make Regular Polygon " +
           " makes a regular n-sided polygon.  Make Regular Star makes an n-pointed " +
           "star.  The latter three menu options show a panel to " +
           " specify the parameters.  ")
   
}
